name: Maryam Usman
role: Health Communication Strategist | Digital Wellness Advocate
bio: Maryam Usman is a passionate health communication strategist focused on bridging digital engagement with real-world impact. Through creative media, she designs campaigns that make wellness information accessible, relatable, and culturally grounded for communities across Nigeria.

cards.title: Expertise & Focus
cards.content: Digital health campaigns, storytelling for behavior change, and health media training for community workers.

cards.title: Impact Projects
cards.content: Led the ‘Voices for Health’ digital storytelling initiative, empowering local educators to share preventive health messages through social media.

cards.title: Personal Vision
cards.content: To establish a nationwide creative communication lab dedicated to innovative wellness education and youth-driven advocacy.
